body.p: {{tp34|When practicing your pronunciation, proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli74|Click the Play icon and listen to the original recording.}}
{{tli75|Click the Record icon and record your own pronunciation. To stop recording, click the icon again.}}
{{tli76|Click the next Play icon, replay your recording and compare it with the original one.}}
{{tli77|Repeat the whole process until you are satisfied with the result.}}
